title: Learn about the Corona virus
allTitles: {"en":"Learn about the Corona virus","tpi":"Coronavirus em i wanem samting?"}
copyright: Copyright © 2020, Education for Life SIL PNG
credits:
Adapted from original copy 'Learn about the coronavirus, coloring book'
by St. Jude Children's Research Hospital

https://together.stjude.org

9.tpi: Ating yu bin harim planti lain i stori long 'Coronavirus.' 'Coronavirus' em i wanpela binatang nogut we i save mekim ol manmeri i pilim sik.
9.en: You might have heard lots of people talking about something called the “coronavirus.” Coronavirus is a type of virus that can make you feel sick.

10.tpi: Ating yu bin harim planti lain i stori long 'Coronavirus.' 'Coronavirus' em i wanpela binatang nogut we i save mekim ol manmeri i pilim sik.
10.en: You might have heard lots of people talking about something called the “coronavirus.” Coronavirus is a type of virus that can make you feel sick.

15.tpi: Coronavirus em i wanepela longpela nem. Long Tok Inglis mining bilong "corona" em i "crown" (dispela het bilas ol king na kwin i save werim). Dispela binatang em i liklik tru na i hat long lukim. Bai yu nidim 'microscope' long lukim. Taim yu lukim dispela binatang coronavirus wantaim "microscope", bai yu lukim olsem dispela binatang i gat "crown".
15.en: Coronavirus is a big word, but did you know that “corona” means crown? When you look at coronavirus under a microscope, a part of the virus looks like a crown.

16.tpi: Coronavirus em i wanepela longpela nem. Long Tok Inglis mining bilong "corona" em i "crown" (dispela het bilas ol king na kwin i save werim). Dispela binatang em i liklik tru na i hat long lukim. Bai yu nidim 'microscope' long lukim. Taim yu lukim dispela binatang coronavirus wantaim "microscope", bai yu lukim olsem dispela binatang i gat "crown".
16.en: Coronavirus is a big word, but did you know that “corona” means crown? When you look at coronavirus under a microscope, a part of the virus looks like a crown.

19.tpi: Planti manmeri long wol i kisim dispela sik pinis. Long wanem, Corona ken kalap wanpela igo narapela isi tru.
19.en: because coronavirus spreads easily from person to person.

20.tpi: Planti manmeri long wol i kisim dispela sik pinis. Long wanem, Corona ken kalap wanpela igo narapela isi tru.
20.en: because coronavirus spreads easily from person to person.

23.tpi: dua o ol samting ol man i save holim planti taim.

24.tpi: dua o ol samting ol man i save holim planti taim.

29.en: It feels a lot like when you have a cold or the flu.

30.en: It feels a lot like when you have a cold or the flu.

41.en: It is important that you WASH YOUR HANDS OFTEN

42.en: It is important that you WASH YOUR HANDS OFTEN

43.en: When you wash your hands with soap germs like coronavirus go away!
43.tpi: Taim yu WASIM HAN BILONG YOU wantaim sop, yu ken rausim ol binatang nogut olsem coronavirus!

44.en: When you wash your hands with soap germs like coronavirus go away!
44.tpi: Taim yu WASIM HAN BILONG YOU wantaim sop, yu ken rausim ol binatang nogut olsem coronavirus!

51.tpi: 6) Stap long haus, noken raun tumas
51.en: 6. Stay at home and stay safe.

52.tpi: 6) Stap long haus, noken raun tumas
52.en: 6. Stay at home and stay safe.

53.tpi: 6) Stap long haus, noken raun tumas
53.en: 6. Stay at home and stay safe.

56.tpi: Dispela sik coronavirus i kamapim planti senis long ol komyuniti na mekim sampela manmeri i wari. Sampela lain i wari nogut ol i kisim dispela sik o ol wari long ol famili bilong ol.
56.en: Some people worry about all the changes from coronavirus.  They may worry about getting sick or worry about family members.

57.tpi: Dispela sik coronavirus i kamapim planti senis long ol komyuniti na mekim sampela manmeri i wari. Sampela lain i wari nogut ol i kisim dispela sik o ol wari long ol famili bilong ol.
57.en: Some people worry about all the changes from coronavirus.  They may worry about getting sick or worry about family members.
